Question: It is during this period in Athens from 335 to 323 BC when this person is believed to have composed many of his works.
Hints: More than twenty-three hundred years after his death, this person remains one of the most influential people who ever lived.
This person disagreed with Plato on this point, arguing that all universals are instantiated.
This person was appointed as the head of the royal academy of Macedon.
